definition: (of e.g. speech and writing) tending to depart from the main point or cover a wide range of subjects
details:
adjective
- (of e.g. speech and writing) tending to depart from the main point or cover a wide range of subjects
= example: (of e.g. speech and writing) tending to depart from the main point or cover a wide range of subjects
= synonyms: rambling
- of superficial relevance if any
= example: of superficial relevance if any
= synonyms: tangential
